message.name: INF_EMAIL_CONTENT
message.locale:
Dear %1s,

You have requested your log in details. They are outlined below. We advise that you change your password the next time you log in to your account by choosing the 'Reset Password' option within your account.

Your user name is: %2s
Your password is: %3s

Yours Sincerely,
%4s

Yours Sincerely,
